messages.title: NEIL HAY STANDING UP FOR YOU
messages.content: "Neil will be a strong voice for you and your family"

images.caption: "Neil will be a strong voice for you and your family"

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains a quote, possibly from the candidate or a supporter, and promises that if elected, the candidate's main priority will be the concerns of the people of Edinburgh South. It mentions the intent to end austerity cuts which both the Tories and Labour plan to continue, and to create more jobs and build a fairer society.
